          <title>
            <string language="en">Measurement of acceleration due to gravity</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Messen der Beschleunigung wegen der Schwerkraft</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mesure de l'accélération due à la pesanteur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Medida do acceleration  devido à gravidade</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Misura di accelerazione dovuto gravità</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μέτρηση της ταχύτητας λόγω στη βαρύτητα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Medida de la aceleración  debido a la gravedad</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">First of three illustrations showing experimental set-ups for measuring the acceleration due to gravity. This set-up uses an electronic timer to monitor the movement of a ball-bearing.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">measurement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ball-bearing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electromagnet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electronic timer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">experiment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">free fall</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gravitational constant</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gravity</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zuerst von drei Abbildungen, die experimentelle 
Installationen für das Messen der Beschleunigung wegen der 
Schwerkraft zeigen. Diese Installation benutzt einen 
elektronischen Timer, um die Bewegung eines Ball-bearing zu 
überwachen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">D'abord de trois illustrations montrant des 
installations expérimentales pour mesurer l'accélération due à la 
pesanteur. Cette installation emploie un temporisateur 
électronique pour surveiller le mouvement d'un roulement à billes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Primeiramente de três ilustrações que mostram 
instalações experimentais para medir o acceleration  devido à 
gravidade. Esta instalação usa um temporizador eletrônico 
monitorar o movimento de um ball-bearing.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In primo luogo di tre illustrazioni che mostrano 
le messe a punto sperimentali per la misurazione dell'accelerazione 
dovuto gravità. Questa messa a punto usa un temporizzatore 
elettronico per controllare il movimento di un ball-bearing.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρώτα τριών απεικονίσεων που εμφανίζουν πειραματικές 
οργανώσεις για τη μέτρηση της ταχύτητας λόγω στη βαρύτητα. 
Αυτή η οργάνωση χρησιμοποιεί ένα ηλεκτρονικό χρονόμετρο 
για να ελέγξει τη μετακίνηση ενός ρουλεμάν.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Primero de tres ilustraciones que muestran las 
disposiciones experimentales para medir la aceleración  debido a la 
gravedad. Esta disposición utiliza un temporizador electrónico
para vigilar el movimiento de un rodamiento de bolas.</string>
          </description>
